om.devservlet
Class QuestionDefinitions

java.lang.Object
  om.devservlet.QuestionDefinitions

public class QuestionDefinitions
extends java.lang.Object

Manages the list of questions available in the web application's questions/ subfolder. Caches data for 30 seconds only so you can safely change it.
